com.mostc.pftt.util
Class ValgrindMemoryCheckManager

java.lang.Object
  com.mostc.pftt.util.DebuggerManager
      com.mostc.pftt.util.ValgrindMemoryCheckManager

public class ValgrindMemoryCheckManager
extends DebuggerManager

Runs Valgrind's Memcheck tool. This tracks validity and addressibility of a program's memory. Runs on Linux and Mac OS X (there is an unofficial port to FreeBSD and an experimental port to Windows).
